Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Undoes part A of chapter 60 of the laws of 2016, which provides for the transition of the school tax relief property tax exemption to a personal income tax credit; repealer
Summary: Prevents the transition of the school tax relief property tax exemption to a personal income tax credit.
LawCode: Amd §§425 & 496, rpld §425 sub 16, §1306-a sub 6, RPT L; rpld §606 sub§ (eee), amd §606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law and the tax law, in relation to preventing the transitioning of the school tax relief (STAR) exemption into a personal income tax credit; and repealing certain provisions of the real property tax law and the tax law relating thereto
